title: War Plane Flight Simulator
author: Rafael Rodriguez
overview: An immersive flight simulator built with TypeScript featuring realistic physics, aircraft controls, and flight dynamics. Experience the thrill of piloting military aircraft with authentic flight mechanics.
features: Realistic Flight Physics: Lift, drag, thrust, gravity simulation
Advanced HUD: Speed, altitude, fuel, throttle indicators
Flight Instruments: Attitude indicator and compass
Airport Integration: Real airport data from CSV files
